Write an interesting, riveting, lengthy action-packed short fan fic that is a crossover between Naruto, Fate Stay Night: Prisma Illya and High School DxD. 

The plot should go something like this, with the below events happening in chronological order:

. The soul of the Juubi no Ookami [Ten Tailed Wolf] escapes the seal Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, known to most people in the Elemental Nations as the Rikodo Senin [Sage of Six Paths] had placed to trap it inside the new moon he had created for eternity, and enters the body of a newborn Kushina Ōtsutsuki, the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools after the newborn child's soul ends up passing to the afterlife. 

Kushina's parents are unaware of this, because of their joy at finally being able to conceive a child. 

. Kushina still ends up in the Hidden Leaf and becomes the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato by the Hidden Rain, Cloud and Earth Villages during the Second Great Ninja War. However, due to her true self as the legendary Ten-Tails that the Sage of Six Paths had sealed away and her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, she is able to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery of her chakra, masking the usage of her own yokai as the Ten-Tails as simply her using the Nine Tails' power. 

. Itachi is the secret love child of Minato Namkaze and Mikoto Uchiha, and is actually a girl named Isane. 

. This version of Naruto is born as a ookami hanyou [half wolf monster] akin to Inuyasha, the protagonist of the Inuyasha anime and manga series. However, he is more akin to Sesshomaru in the fact that he has elfen ears, silver hair and yellow eyes and does not have wolf ears on top of his head, unless he taps into his yokai during emotional distress. 
This is due to Kushina being a primordial goddess as well as a daiyokai [monster lord], giving her child the strengths and powers of a full-blooded yokai while simultaneously allowing him to keep his humanity.

. Due to a poorly worded request, Kushina's soul [the Ten-Tails/Juubi] gets sealed along with the soul of Kurama Ōtsutsuki inside baby Naruto when Minato uses the Shiki Fujin [Reaper Death Seal] to seal away the Nine Tails inside his son. After the sealing, Naruto's hair turns black and his eyes blue, and he gains whisker marks on his cheeks.

. Things remain unchanged until Naruto is about 5 or 6 years old, and is locked in his room inside the orphanage. He makes a wish about not having to be in Konoha again, and due to unconsciously pulling on Kushina's power inside the seal, finds himself being warped via a superpowered Kamui to Kyoto in Japan, where he is quickly found by salaryman Gorou Hyoudou and his wife, Miki.

. Gorou and Miki adopt Naruto as their son, Issei Hyoudou and Issei grows up in a loving home, never knowing the truth of his origins or what is sealed inside of him. He becomes fast friends with Gorou and Miki's biological children, the fraternal twins Karen and Tsukihi, who are three years younger than Issei and view him as their real older brother as time goes by. 

. Issei also grows close to Gorou's consort Irisivel von Einzbern, a German noblewoman with white hair, a large bust and red eyes, and Irisivel's children, the twins Illya and Chloe. He also develops a close relationship with Irisivel's maids Sella and Leysritt, whom all the children view as their eccentric older sisters.
.

Title: The Unsealed Fate of Worlds

Prologue:

In a time long forgotten, there existed a being known as the Juubi no Ookami, the Ten Tailed Wolf, a monstrous creature with power beyond imagination. Its rampage had caused untold devastation until the legendary Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, also known as the Sage of Six Paths, managed to seal it away in the newly created moon. Peace returned once more, but for a creature so powerful, the seal could never truly be eternal.

------

Chapter 1: The Birth of a Goddess

One fateful night, the heavens shifted and the seal meant to imprison the Juubi no Ookami for eternity began to wane. Sensing its chance, the soul of the Ten-Tailed Wolf escaped its confinement and ventured out into the world. It was drawn to a location that emanated a great and powerful energy, a small village hidden amidst the ancient ruins of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools.

It was there that a new life was just being brought into existence - Kushina Ōtsutsuki, the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, who was destined to become a legendary figure herself. As her parents wept with joy at the successful birth of their long-awaited child, the essence of the Ten-Tails slipped silently into the newborn child, pushing Kushina's soul to the afterlife without a chance for her to truly experience life.

Unbeknownst to her parents, Kushina Ōtsutsuki had become a vessel for the legendary Ten-Tails, a being thought to be nothing more than a myth by the majority of the Elemental Nations.

------

Chapter 2: The Hidden Power Unmasked

Kushina, now carrying the power of Juubi no Ookami, was absorbed into the Hidden Leaf Village's culture after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato during the Second Great Ninja War. Like a wheel of fate spinning, she became the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox, Kurama. 

However, the unthinkable occurred. Kushina, with her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan and the monstrous power of the Ten-Tails, was able to resist Kurama's influence and regain control of her chakra. She deftly hid her true nature from the world, her incredible abilities passing for the result of being the Nine-Tails jinchuriki.

------

Chapter 3: The Secret Love-child and a Monster Unleashed

In the shadows of the village, a secret was kept. Itachi Uchiha, the prodigy of the great Uchiha clan, was actually a girl named Isane, born from a forbidden love between Mikoto Uchiha and Minato Namikaze, the future Fourth Hokage. Her eyes held the power of the Sharingan, but she honed it secretly, hiding her true identity from the world.

During this turbulent time, Naruto was brought into the world, destined for greatness. Kushina, a primordial goddess and a daiyokai wielded incredible power, and her child was born an Ookami hanyou, a half-wolf monster with platinum hair, elfin ears, and golden eyes. He was a force to be reckoned with, possessing both the power of a yokai and the compassion of a human.

------

Chapter 4: The Seal that Changed Everything

On that fateful day, baby Naruto had not only Kurama's, but also Kushina's soul, housing the Ten-Tails, sealed inside him by the desperate hands of Minato Namikaze. Surprisingly, this caused his hair to turn black, his eyes to shift from golden to blue, and whisker-like marks to appear on his cheeks. The world that knew him grew to fear him, and so he was left alone and abandoned.

Fate, however, works in mysterious ways. A young Naruto, tired of the harshness of Konoha, found himself wishing to be anywhere else. At that moment, his latent powers activated, whisking him away to an alternate world, one he had never seen before.

------

Chapter 5: A New Family

Lost in the great city of Kyoto, Naruto, now bearing the Hyoudou surname, was found by a caring couple, Gorou and Miki, who took him in and raised him as their own. With his previous life just a distant memory, Naruto grew up with love, comfort, and the siblings he gained from the union.

In his new life, he formed unbreakable bonds with his siblings, Karen and Tsukihi, and found warmth in their affections. His relationship with Gorou's consort, Irisivel von Einzbern, was also one of great respect and admiration. As time passed, he came to view Irisivel's children, Illya and Chloe, as his own sisters.

------

Chapter 6: The United Front

As the bonds of the Hyoudou clan grew stronger with each passing day, their world began to expand, encompassing not only the ordinary, but also the fantastical. Unbeknownst to many, a great storm was brewing, threatening to shake the foundations of multiple worlds.

As the fantastical and mundane meet, the veil between different worlds begins to thin, setting the stage for a great adventure. Old foes stir once more, powerful forces reawaken, and the secrets of Naruto's past are ever-present, threatening to rip apart the fragile peace he has found in his new family.

The only thing that can stand against this tidal wave of darkness is the hope shared among these powerful individuals, including the secret love child Isane, the unsealed god Kushina, the half-wolf monster Naruto, and their comrades from completely different worlds - the Fate Stay Night: Prisma Illya, and High School DxD. As they are forced to confront their past and face their fears, the greatest battle is yet to come.

Will the Hyoudou clan and their newfound allies be able to halt the destructive forces threatening their world, or are they doomed to succumb to the power of the chaos lurking within the shadows? Only time will reveal the answers.

The plot should go something like this, with the below events happening in chronological order:

Part I: Origins

. The soul of the Juubi no Ookami [Ten Tailed Wolf] escapes the seal Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, known to most people in the Elemental Nations as the Rikodo Senin [Sage of Six Paths] had placed to trap it inside the new moon he had created for eternity, and enters the body of a newborn Kushina Ōtsutsuki, the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools after the newborn child's soul ends up passing to the afterlife. 

Kushina's parents are unaware of this, because of their joy at finally being able to conceive a child. 

. Due to her status as the Ōtsutsuki clan heiress and also due to her soul being that of the Juubi no Ookami, an already famous and powerful yokai that became even more powerful due to it consuming a spare Shinju fruit sometime after Kaguya Ōtsutsuki did, Kushina has the Rinne-Sharingan, along with the infamous doujutsu kekkai genkai [eye jutsu bloodline] of the Ōtsutsuki clan, the Byakugan. As she grows, she quickly becomes a master of Fūinjutsu [sealing arts] and the long lost magical arts of the Ōtsutsuki clan, passed down from its founder Hamura Ōtsutsuki, the older brother of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, the legendary Sage of Six Paths. 

.Kushina keeps the fact that she has the Rinne-Sharingan a secret, as even she herself is not sure how to use this power

. She also masters the Jūken style of taijutsu [martial arts] that utilizes the ability of the Byakugan to see and observe chakra in an opponent, to quickly strike the chakra circulation points and shut them down.

. Kushina still ends up in the Hidden Leaf and becomes the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato by the Hidden Rain, Cloud and Earth Villages during the Second Great Ninja War. However, due to her true self as the legendary Ten-Tails that the Sage of Six Paths had sealed away and her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, she is able to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery of her chakra, masking the usage of her own yokai as the Ten-Tails as simply her using the Nine Tails' power. 

. She is also to finally able to understand and use some of the powers of her Rinne-Sharingan, due to secretly reading the Senju and Uchiha secret scrolls. 

. Kushina and Mikoto Uchiha share Minato in a secret polygamous relationship, despite Mikoto's engagement to the head of the Uchiha clan, Fugaku. 

. Itachi is the secret love child of Minato Namkaze and Mikoto Uchiha, and is actually a girl named Isane. Sometime after the Kyuubi attack, she awakens her Sharingan due to the stress and trauma of the event and ends up warping herself via Kamui to Kamakura, where she is found by Tesshin Kawakami, an elderly monk and legendary martial artist, and raised as his granddaughter, Momoyo Kawakami. 


Part 2: Birth

. This version of Naruto is born as a ookami hanyou [half wolf monster] akin to Inuyasha, the protagonist of the Inuyasha anime and manga series. However, he is more akin to Sesshomaru in the fact that he has elfen ears, silver hair and yellow eyes and does not have wolf ears on top of his head, unless he taps into his yokai during emotional distress. 

This is due to Kushina being a primordial goddess as well as a daiyokai [monster lord], giving her child the strengths and powers of a full-blooded yokai while simultaneously allowing him to keep his humanity.

. Due to a poorly worded request, Kushina's soul [the Ten-Tails/Juubi] gets sealed along with the soul of Kurama Ōtsutsuki inside baby Naruto when Minato uses the Shiki Fujin [Reaper Death Seal] to seal away the Nine Tails inside his son. After the sealing, Naruto's hair turns black and his eyes blue, and he gains whisker marks on his cheeks due to the seal also sealing away his yoki and yokai power, along with Kushina and Kurama.

Part 3: Strange Encounters

A few years have passed since the sealing, and Naruto has become close friends with Sasuke Uchiha and Sakura Haruno. Naruto also befriends a young girl named Miyu Edelfelt, who has recently moved into the village. Unbeknownst to Naruto, Miyu is a pawn in a larger game involving the Magical World and their attempt to obtain the power-controlled stable Eight-Point Circle System. Upon first meeting, Naruto is completely intrigued by Miyu and her companion, the mysterious Servant known as Saber.

One day, a group sent by an evil organization from the realm of High School DxD attacks the village, bent on capturing Naruto and using his latent powers. The village's defenses are no match for the powerful beings, but just as all hope seems lost, Miyu and Saber leap into action. With their combined strength, they manage to drive off the attackers.

Both amazed and confused by the display, Naruto questions how Miyu and Saber have such incredible powers. Miyu reveals that she and Saber are actually from an alternate timeline, one where the Holy Grail War is a genuine competition and the battle between mage families is waged in the shadows. In their timeline, Miyu's sister, Illya, becomes entrenched in the dangerous war for the ultimate prize: a powerful artifact capable of granting any wish.

Part 4: Alliance and Battle

Shocked by the revelations, Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura form a pact with Miyu and Saber to help protect their village from the constant threats of High School DxD and the Mage Association who wish to possess Naruto's mysterious power. As their bonds deepen, Naruto slowly begins to remember his dormant powers and starts to unlock them, regaining his silver hair and yellow eyes.

Together, the team faces many enemies from the world of High School DxD, such as devils, fallen angels, and even gods. In order to handle their newfound challenges, they train extensively, with Naruto learning how to use his hybrid powers and both Sasuke and Sakura obtaining magecraft skills. With each battle they face, their growing strength attracts the attention of powerful beings from various realms, such as magicians, servants, and even dragons, who form alliances or challenge them as enemies.

To aid them in their tireless battle, Momoyo Kawakami returns to the Elementary Nations, revealing her true identity as Itachi Uchiha. She tells Naruto the truth about his heritage, explaining the connection between Minato, Kushina, and Mikoto. Inspired and emboldened, Naruto vows to protect both his dear friends and the Elemental Nations from any threat that arises, determined to uphold the legacy of his family and their powerful heritage.

Part 5: The Final Battle

Their continuous battles to protect the Elemental Nations eventually lead to an all-out war between High School DxD's coalition of factions, Miyu's Mage Association, Naruto's allies, and various other powerful beings with interest in the power contained within Naruto. In order to prevent massive catastrophe, Naruto decides to take on his enemies' leader, the primordial and all-powerful being Ophis, in a one-on-one battle, while his friends and allies face off against Ophis's subordinates.

Before the decisive battle occurs, Sasuke, Sakura, Miyu, and Saber reveal that they have unearthed a way to restore Kushina's soul to her rightful place, along with both Kurama and the Juubi no Ookami. They perform an ancient seal on Naruto, releasing the deity and the powerful creatures who had been imprisoned within him since his birth.

With Kushina's spirit by his side, as well as the strength of both Kurama and the Juubi no Ookami, Naruto confronts Ophis in a battle for the ages. After an awe-inspiring clash showcasing power unlike anything the world had ever seen, Naruto finally defeats Ophis and saves the Elemental Nations.

Part 6: A New Beginning

With the threat eliminated, an era of peace and prosperity begins for the Elemental Nations. Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura, along with their friends, continue to protect their world from danger, balancing their time as powerful warriors with lives as ordinary citizens.

Miyu and Saber, appreciative of the strong bonds they forged with Naruto and his friends, decide to remain in the Elemental Nations, protecting their newfound home with the same unwavering dedication they once displayed in their original timeline.

As the sun sets over the horizon, Naruto stands with his loved ones, confident that the world is at peace and that he has finally earned his place as a hero in his own right. The story of his incredible journey comes to a close, leaving a powerful legacy of determination, friendship, and hope for the Elemental Nations and beyond.

conversation.content:
Write an interesting, riveting, lengthy action-packed series of chapters for a  fanfic that is a crossover between Naruto, Fate Stay Night: Prisma Illya, Majikoi, Bakemonogatari and High School DxD. 

The plot should go something like this, with the below events happening in chronological order:

Part I: Origins

. The soul of the Juubi no Ookami [Ten Tailed Wolf] escapes the seal Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, known to most people in the Elemental Nations as the Rikodo Senin [Sage of Six Paths] had placed to trap it inside the new moon he had created for eternity, and enters the body of a newborn Kushina Ōtsutsuki, the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools after the newborn child's soul ends up passing to the afterlife. 

Kushina's parents are unaware of this, because of their joy at finally being able to conceive a child. 

. Due to her status as the Ōtsutsuki clan heiress and also due to her soul being that of the Juubi no Ookami, an already famous and powerful yokai that became even more powerful due to it consuming a spare Shinju fruit sometime after Kaguya Ōtsutsuki did, Kushina has the Rinne-Sharingan, along with the infamous doujutsu kekkai genkai [eye jutsu bloodline] of the Ōtsutsuki clan, the Byakugan. As she grows, she quickly becomes a master of Fūinjutsu [sealing arts] and the long lost magical arts of the Ōtsutsuki clan, passed down from its founder Hamura Ōtsutsuki, the older brother of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, the legendary Sage of Six Paths. 

.Kushina keeps the fact that she has the Rinne-Sharingan a secret, as even she herself is not sure how to use this power

. She also masters the Jūken style of taijutsu [martial arts] that utilizes the ability of the Byakugan to see and observe chakra in an opponent, to quickly strike the chakra circulation points and shut them down.

. Kushina still ends up in the Hidden Leaf and becomes the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato by the Hidden Rain, Cloud and Earth Villages during the Second Great Ninja War. However, due to her true self as the legendary Ten-Tails that the Sage of Six Paths had sealed away and her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, she is able to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery of her chakra, masking the usage of her own yokai as the Ten-Tails as simply her using the Nine Tails' power. 

. She is also to finally able to understand and use some of the powers of her Rinne-Sharingan, due to secretly reading the Senju and Uchiha secret scrolls. 

. Kushina and Mikoto Uchiha share Minato in a secret polygamous relationship, despite Mikoto's engagement to the head of the Uchiha clan, Fugaku. 

. Itachi is the secret love child of Minato Namkaze and Mikoto Uchiha, and is actually a girl named Isane. Sometime after the Kyuubi attack, she awakens her Sharingan due to the stress and trauma of the event and ends up warping herself via Kamui to Kamakura, where she is found by Tesshin Kawakami, an elderly monk and legendary martial artist, and raised as his granddaughter, Momoyo Kawakami. 


Part 2: Birth

. This version of Naruto is born as a ookami hanyou [half wolf monster] akin to Inuyasha, the protagonist of the Inuyasha anime and manga series. However, he is more akin to Sesshomaru in the fact that he has elfen ears, silver hair and yellow eyes and does not have wolf ears on top of his head, unless he taps into his yokai during emotional distress. 

This is due to Kushina being a primordial goddess as well as a daiyokai [monster lord], giving her child the strengths and powers of a full-blooded yokai while simultaneously allowing him to keep his humanity.

. Due to a poorly worded request, Kushina's soul [the Ten-Tails/Juubi] gets sealed along with the soul of Kurama Ōtsutsuki inside baby Naruto when Minato uses the Shiki Fujin [Reaper Death Seal] to seal away the Nine Tails inside his son. After the sealing, Naruto's hair turns black and his eyes blue, and he gains whisker marks on his cheeks due to the seal also sealing away his yoki and yokai power, along with Kushina and Kurama. 

Part 3: Discovery

. Things remain unchanged until Naruto is about 5 or 6 years old, and is locked in his room inside the orphanage. He makes a wish about not having to be in Konoha again, and due to unconsciously pulling on Kushina's power inside the seal, finds himself being warped via a superpowered Kamui to Kyoto in Japan, where he is quickly found by salaryman Gorou Hyoudou and his wife, Miki.

. Gorou and Miki adopt Naruto as their son, Issei Hyoudou and Issei grows up in a loving home, never knowing the truth of his origins or what is sealed inside of him. He becomes fast friends with Gorou and Miki's biological children, the fraternal twins Karen and Tsukihi, who are three years younger than Issei and view him as their real older brother as time goes by. 

. Issei also grows close to Gorou's consort Irisivel von Einzbern, a German noblewoman with white hair, a large bust and red eyes, and Irisivel's children, the twins Illya and Chloe. He also develops a close relationship with Irisivel's maids Sella and Leysritt, whom all the children view as their eccentric older sisters.

. He also grows close to his adoptive older cousin Irina Shidou, although he is saddened when she has to leave with her family to England. 

. On a family trip to Kamakura, Issei meets Momoyo, and the two become fast friends despite their vast age difference. Momoyo senses Issei's familar chakra and is surprised that he has her mother's friend Kushina as well as the Nine Tails inside of him, but she keeps this suspicion to herself. 

.Karen's abilities as an ookami yokai [wolf monster] and the heiress to the Tohkasa clan prematurely awaken during the trip and as a result, she enters a form akin to a hanyou, with her wolf ears popping out of the top of her head at inappropriate times. This earns her the name "Wanko" from Momoyo, which she finds rather distasteful. 

. Tsukihi is kidnapped near the end of the trip, and the family spends 2 sleepless days worrying about her until Sella returns, holding a sleeping Tsukihi in her arms in a princess carry style with her regular bland look on her face. The local news reports that the Matou family, a local Mafia clan infamous for their strange activities, was wiped out by an unknown assailant. Issei quickly puts two and two together, but says nothing. 

. The experience changes Tsukihi, making her even more reclused and introverted than before. Her hair turns a bright purple, and she cuts it in a short bowl cut after recovering enough to leave the hospital. She also starts wearing traditional Japanese clothes at home, constantly harassing Sella and Leysritt to teach her the arts of homemaking, which they relent and give into in the end. Surprisingly, Tsukihi is very good at this task and is praised by the two maids for her skill and diligence. 

Part 4: Adolescence

. Issei grows into a confident, charming young man, unaware of his true origins and not caring about them anyways. From elementary to middle school, he is a star student and a rather famous baseball player, which earns him the jealousy of his classmates. 

. His younger adoptive sisters Karen, Tsukihi, Illya and Chloe all have feelings for him, even though he is unaware of this and just assumes they love him a bit too dearly. 

. When Issei is a second year at Tenbi High, he catches the eye of seductive, popular English teacher Himekami Lizel. Lizel is actually the Princess of the House of Gremory, the de-facto royal family of the Underworld, Rias Gremory. Lizel under her true name of Rias, is intrested in Issei due to his powerful Sacred Gear of the Red Dragon Emperor, but she finds herself falling in love with him due to his kindness and good heart. 

. One day, Issei is mistaken for his perverted friends Matsuda and Motohoma, and beaten to an inch of his life by the enraged Kendo Club in a case of mistaken identity. Lizel, seizing the opportunity, revives the young man as her Pawn, which has the unexpected result of loosening the seal and allowing his yoki, which had been building up inside of him, to finally be released and circulate through his body. 

. This, along with the fact that the reincarnation process awoke Ddraig, the legendary Welsh Dragon inside Issei's Sacred Gear, essentially reconstructs Issei into a draconic- ookami hanyou [half wolf monster]-demigod reincarnated devil hybrid, enhancing and boosting his already formidable power 100 fold. 

. Issei is surprised at his new powers when he awakens and is confused when Lizel informs him of her true identity and what he now is, but quickly adjusts to it. 

. The plot of High School DxD continues as in the canon light novels, manga and 2012-2018 anime series, with the exception of Issei defeating Riser and the Phenix heir's peerage during the Rating Game, convincing the three female Fallen Angels Raynare, Kalwarner and Millet to join his side and killing the insane priest Freed Seltzen during the attack on the church before the fight against Riser and his peerage, and Irina revealing she is a succubus during the Holy Sword search arc. 

. Issei also discovers that his younger adoptive half-sisters, the fraternal twins Illya and Chloe von Einzbern, are actually magical girls who use the Class Cards to transform and fight the supernatural monsters popping up in the city. He also discovers Illya and Chloe's best friend, the reserved but intelligent black-haired Japanese beauty Miyu Edelfelt, is also a magical girl. 

This discovery comes as a result of Rias and her peerage receiving a message from the Archduke to kill a group of Strays causing trouble, only to find Illya, Chloe and Miyu leaving the scene with the monsters dead. 

. Needless to say, Rias/Lizel is not pleased and a rivalry starts to develop between Rias, Akeno and Koneko and Illya, Chloe and Miyu over their shared love for Issei. Issei's little sisters and the female members of Rias' peerage, along with Rias herself eventually get along and start sharing Issei, although this is a long and eventual process that takes years. 

. Issei also discovers that Karen is the heiress of the Tohsaka clan of magi while Tsukihi is the heiress of the Matou clan of magi, with Karen being Illya's mentor in the magical arts when the latter awakened her powers. Issei also meets Miyu's mentor, the arrogant and bold Luvia Edelfelt. 

. During a meeting of the Gremory and Shitori peerages at the ORC clubhouse located in the old Tenbi school building, Student Council President Tsubawa Hanekawa surprises everybody by confessing her love for Issei under her true name of Souna Shitori, the heiress of the House of Shitori that rules the Underworld along with Rias' House the Gremory and the House of Phenix, in front of a shocked Rias and the Gremory Princess' stunned peerage. To everybody's shock, the female members of Hanekawa's peerage also confess their love for Issei as well after that, further increasing Issei's already large harem. 

Part 5: Idols and Challenges

. One day when going home, Issei meets a mysterious woman named Suruga Kanbaru, who is later revealed to be a famous women's college basketball player and also a well-known idol under the name of Hoshigaoka Stella. Kanbaru seems to be very familar with Issei despite them not meeting before, and teases him during their conversation about "tying the knot early with so many".

. It is later discovered that Suruga/Stella is actually Serafell Leviathan, one of the leaders of the Underworld and Hanekawa/Souna's estranged older sister. Hanekawa and Issei are revealed to be childhood friends, with a younger Hanekawa even swearing to marry Issei along with Irina when all three of them were children. This causes a considerable amount of embarrassment for both Hanekawa and Irina when this is exposed to the other girls by Serafell/Kanbaru/Stella. 

. Momoyo also reunites with Issei, and starts training him how to use his ki [physical energy] and chakra. She also falls in love with him and joins his harem.

. The youngest daughter of Issei's adoptive parents Gorou and Miki, the half-kitsune [spirit fox]. half-snake god hybrid known as Sengoku Nadeko, awakens her powers as the reincarnation of the Dragon God Ophis, causing the pureblood devil Riseviem to send his minions after her. Rias, Hanekawa/Souna and Rias/Lizel along with their respective peerages are assigned to guard the precocious young girl, which causes Nadeko to develop a crush on her adoptive older brother Issei when she learns that he is Rias' Pawn and a hero in the supernatural world. 

. The fight against Riseveim is long and hard, but eventually, Issei manages to meld the power of his ookami yokai [wolf monster], devil and dragon forms into a single massive form, allowing him to destroy the madman once and for all. 

. Issei's rival, the White Dragon Emperor Vali Lucifer, is revealed to be a cute girl named Emila Hermit, and joins Issei's harem along with Nadeko and Koneko's sister, the supposed criminal Kuroka after Riseviem's fall. This causes the collapse of Khaos Brigade as many of its members refuse to accept this supposed betrayal.

Conclusion

The story ends with Issei thinking about his life, while the girls of his harem take care of their newborn babies throught the large mansion they now call home. 


.

Part I: Origins

Chapter 1: The Ten-Tailed Wolf

The quiet, sleepy village of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools was unaware of the momentous event about to occur. The seal placed by Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, the Sage of Six Paths, had weakened over time, allowing the soul of the Juubi no Ookami to escape its prison within the moon.

Sensing a newly-born life, the Ten-Tailed Wolf's soul was drawn to the heir of the powerful Ōtsutsuki clan, a newborn named Kushina Ōtsutsuki. As her soul passed to the afterlife, the Juubi no Ookami took possession of the infant's body, effectively being reborn as the new Kushina.

Chapter 2: The Heiress of the Ōtsutsuki Clan

Kushina's parents, Jinsei and Haruka Ōtsutsuki, were overjoyed to finally have a child. Unbeknownst to them, Kushina was now the vessel of the legendary Ten-Tails. Due to her status as the Ōtsutsuki heiress and her unique soul, Kushina possessed both the Byakugan and the extremely rare Rinne-Sharingan. With her immense power and potential, Kushina quickly became a master of Fūinjutsu and the long-lost magical arts of the Ōtsutsuki clan.

Chapter 3: Secrets and Disguises

Despite her immense power, Kushina kept her Rinne-Sharingan a secret. She learned and honed her skills with her Byakugan, mastering the Jūken style, and worked towards understanding the mysterious abilities of her Rinne-Sharingan.

As events unfolded, the Hidden Rain, Cloud, and Earth villages attacked Uzushiogakure no Sato, leading to its destruction. Kushina was taken to Konoha, where she became the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox. However, she used her immense power and training to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery over herself.

Chapter 4: Love and Deception

In the bustling village of Konoha, Kushina found love in the form of the Yellow Flash, Minato Namikaze. She also built a secret relationship with Mikoto Uchiha, sharing Minato's love in a polygamous bond.

From their union, a child was born – Itachi. However, she was actually a girl named Isane Uchiha. After the Kyuubi attack, her Sharingan awoke and she found herself warped to Kamakura, where Tesshin Kawakami took her in and raised her as his granddaughter, Momoyo Kawakami.

Part 2: Birth

Chapter 5: The Birth of a Demigod

Kushina gave birth to a unique child - Naruto, an ookami hanyou with elfen ears, silver hair, and yellow eyes. His appearance was more similar to the powerful Sesshomaru than the lovable Inuyasha. Kushina's true nature as a primordial goddess and a daiyokai allowed Naruto to keep his humanity while possessing the power of a full-blooded yokai.

Chapter 6: The Sealing of the Ten-Tails

After Naruto's birth, a tragic mishap unfolded. Kushina's soul, the Ten-Tails, was accidentally sealed within the infant along with Kurama Ōtsutsuki. The sealing altered Naruto's appearance, turning his hair black and his eyes blue.

Part 3: Discovery

Chapter 7: A Wishful Escape

As a young child, Naruto found himself locked in his room at the orphanage one day. In his desperation to escape, he unwittingly tapped into Kushina's power within the seal and found himself transported to Kyoto, Japan. There, he was discovered by Gorou Hyoudou and his wife, Miki, who took him in and raised him as Issei Hyoudou.

Chapter 8: Bonds of Family

Issei grew up surrounded by love, with his adoptive siblings Karen, Tsukihi, Illya, and Chloe, as well as his adoptive cousin Irina Shidou. He developed close relationships with his adoptive family, including Irisivel von Einzbern and her maids Sella and Leysritt.

Chapter 9: A Trip to Kamakura

During a fateful family trip to Kamakura, each of Issei's family members faced their own trials and tribulations. Karen's powers as an ookami yokai awakened, Tsukihi was kidnapped, and Issei met Momoyo, a powerful martial artist who held a connection to his past.

Karen gained the nickname "Wanko" due to the wolf ears that appeared and disappeared at seemingly random moments. Tsukihi, after being rescued by an enigmatic Sella, changed her appearance and aspirations, devoting herself to becoming a proper homemaker.

Part 4: Adolescence

Chapter 10: The Life of Issei Hyoudou

Growing up, Issei excelled in school and sports, earning the envy of his classmates. He remained oblivious to the growing affection his sisters and childhood friends held for him.

Chapter 11: The Red Dragon Awakens

In high school, Issei caught the eye of Himekami Lizel, a seductive teacher who was really Rias Gremory, the heiress to the House Gremory. As fate would have it, Issei was attacked and nearly killed, leading Rias to reincarnate him as her pawn.

This action awakened Ddraig, the Welsh Dragon within Issei's sacred gear, transforming Issei into a draconic-ookami hanyou-demigod hybrid with unparalleled potential.

Chapter 12: Magical Girls and Rivalries

Issei discovered his adoptive sisters, Illya and Chloe, were actually magical girls battling supernatural threats alongside their friend Miyu Edelfelt. This revelation sparked tension and competition between Rias, Akeno, and Koneko, as well as Illya, Chloe, and Miyu, who all vied for Issei's affection.

Chapter 13: A Tangled Web

Issei's life grew even more complicated as he was pulled into high-profile battles involving the Gremory family, the House of Shitori, and his own vast harem.

As relationships shifted and evolved, Issei trained with Momoyo, embracing his ability to wield his ki and chakra, as well as the additional power that resulted from his complex heritage.

Chapter 15: The Fall of the Khaos Brigade

The White Dragon Emperor, after being revealed as a girl named Emila Hermit, joined Issei's ever-growing harem. This, coupled with Issei's defeat of Riseviem, led to the collapse of the Khaos Brigade.

Conclusion

After many trials and tribulations, Issei settled down with his vast harem, cherishing the loving family he had built for himself.

Kushina still ends up in the Hidden Leaf and becomes the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato by the Hidden Rain, Cloud and Earth Villages during the Second Great Ninja War. However, due to her true self as the legendary Ten-Tails that the Sage of Six Paths had sealed away and her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, she is able to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery of her chakra, masking the usage of her own yokai as the Ten-Tails as simply her using the Nine Tails' power. 

. She is also to finally able to understand and use some of the powers of her Rinne-Sharingan, due to secretly reading the Senju and Uchiha secret scrolls. 

. Kushina and Mikoto Uchiha share Minato in a secret polygamous relationship, despite Mikoto's engagement to the head of the Uchiha clan, Fugaku. 

. Itachi is the secret love child of Minato Namkaze and Mikoto Uchiha, and is actually a girl named Isane. Sometime after the Kyuubi attack, she awakens her Sharingan due to the stress and trauma of the event and ends up warping herself via Kamui to Kamakura, where she is found by Tesshin Kawakami, an elderly monk and legendary martial artist, and raised as his granddaughter, Momoyo Kawakami. 


Part 2: Birth

. This version of Naruto is born as a ookami hanyou [half wolf monster] akin to Inuyasha, the protagonist of the Inuyasha anime and manga series. However, he is more akin to Sesshomaru in the fact that he has elfen ears, silver hair and yellow eyes and does not have wolf ears on top of his head, unless he taps into his yokai during emotional distress. 

This is due to Kushina being a primordial goddess as well as a daiyokai [monster lord], giving her child the strengths and powers of a full-blooded yokai while simultaneously allowing him to keep his humanity.

. Due to a poorly worded request, Kushina's soul [the Ten-Tails/Juubi] gets sealed along with the soul of Kurama Ōtsutsuki inside baby Naruto when Minato uses the Shiki Fujin [Reaper Death Seal] to seal away the Nine Tails inside his son. After the sealing, Naruto's hair turns black and his eyes blue, and he gains whisker marks on his cheeks due to the seal also sealing away his yoki and yokai power, along with Kushina and Kurama. 

Part 3: Discovery

. Things remain unchanged until Naruto is about 5 or 6 years old, and is locked in his room inside the orphanage. He makes a wish about not having to be in Konoha again, and due to unconsciously pulling on Kushina's power inside the seal, finds himself being warped via a superpowered Kamui to Kyoto in Japan, where he is quickly found by salaryman Gorou Hyoudou and his wife, Miki.

. Gorou and Miki adopt Naruto as their son, Issei Hyoudou and Issei grows up in a loving home, never knowing the truth of his origins or what is sealed inside of him. He becomes fast friends with Gorou and Miki's biological children, the fraternal twins Karen and Tsukihi, who are three years younger than Issei and view him as their real older brother as time goes by. 

. Issei also grows close to Gorou's consort Irisivel von Einzbern, a German noblewoman with white hair, a large bust and red eyes, and Irisivel's children, the twins Illya and Chloe. He also develops a close relationship with Irisivel's maids Sella and Leysritt, whom all the children view as their eccentric older sisters.

. He also grows close to his adoptive older cousin Irina Shidou, although he is saddened when she has to leave with her family to England. 

. On a family trip to Kamakura, Issei meets Momoyo, and the two become fast friends despite their vast age difference. Momoyo senses Issei's familar chakra and is surprised that he has her mother's friend Kushina as well as the Nine Tails inside of him, but she keeps this suspicion to herself.

. Issei also meets the shy and reclusive, blue haired and red-eyed girl Miyako Shiina, who is actually the daughter of Gendo Ikari and his wife Yui Ayanami created as a weapon to pilot the experimental EVA Unit mechs, Rei Ayanami, and the two become fast friends. Unfortunately, Miyako/Rei is discovered by some of Gendo's thugs and taken back to the Geofront, although she never forgets the memories of her time with Issei. 

.Karen's abilities as an ookami yokai [wolf monster] and the heiress to the Tohkasa clan prematurely awaken during the trip and as a result, she enters a form akin to a hanyou, with her wolf ears popping out of the top of her head at inappropriate times. This earns her the name "Wanko" from Momoyo, which she finds rather distasteful. 

. Tsukihi is kidnapped near the end of the trip, and the family spends 2 sleepless days worrying about her until Sella returns, holding a sleeping Tsukihi in her arms in a princess carry style with her regular bland look on her face. The local news reports that the Matou family, a local Mafia clan infamous for their strange activities, was wiped out by an unknown assailant. Issei quickly puts two and two together, but says nothing. 

. The experience changes Tsukihi, making her even more reclused and introverted than before. Her hair turns a bright purple, and she cuts it in a short bowl cut after recovering enough to leave the hospital. She also starts wearing traditional Japanese clothes at home, constantly harassing Sella and Leysritt to teach her the arts of homemaking, which they relent and give into in the end. Surprisingly, Tsukihi is very good at this task and is praised by the two maids for her skill and diligence. 

Part 4: Adolescence

. Issei grows into a confident, charming young man, unaware of his true origins and not caring about them anyways. From elementary to middle school, he is a star student and a rather famous baseball player, which earns him the jealousy of his classmates. 

. His younger adoptive sisters Karen, Tsukihi, Illya and Chloe all have feelings for him, even though he is unaware of this and just assumes they love him a bit too dearly. 

. When Issei is a second year at Tenbi High, he catches the eye of seductive, popular English teacher Himekami Lizel. Lizel is actually the Princess of the House of Gremory, the de-facto royal family of the Underworld, Rias Gremory. Lizel under her true name of Rias, is interested in Issei due to his powerful Sacred Gear of the Red Dragon Emperor, but she finds herself falling in love with him due to his kindness and good heart. 

. One day, Issei is mistaken for his perverted friends Matsuda and Motohoma, and beaten to an inch of his life by the enraged Kendo Club in a case of mistaken identity. Lizel, seizing the opportunity, revives the young man as her Pawn, which has the unexpected result of loosening the seal and allowing his yoki, which had been building up inside of him, to finally be released and circulate through his body. 

. This, along with the fact that the reincarnation process awoke Ddraig, the legendary Welsh Dragon inside Issei's Sacred Gear, essentially reconstructs Issei into a draconic- ookami hanyou [half wolf monster]-demigod reincarnated devil hybrid, enhancing and boosting his already formidable power 100 fold. 

. Issei is surprised at his new powers when he awakens and is confused when Lizel informs him of her true identity and what he now is, but quickly adjusts to it. 

. The plot of High School DxD continues as in the canon light novels, manga and 2012-2018 anime series, with the exception of Issei defeating Riser and the Phenix heir's peerage during the Rating Game, convincing the three female Fallen Angels Raynare, Kalwarner and Millet to join his side and killing the insane priest Freed Seltzen during the attack on the church before the fight against Riser and his peerage, and Irina revealing she is a succubus during the Holy Sword search arc. 

. Issei also discovers that his younger adoptive half-sisters, the fraternal twins Illya and Chloe von Einzbern, are actually magical girls who use the Class Cards to transform and fight the supernatural monsters popping up in the city. He also discovers Illya and Chloe's best friend, the reserved but intelligent black-haired Japanese beauty Miyu Edelfelt, is also a magical girl. 

This discovery comes as a result of Rias and her peerage receiving a message from the Archduke to kill a group of Strays causing trouble, only to find Illya, Chloe and Miyu leaving the scene with the monsters dead. 

. Needless to say, Rias/Lizel is not pleased and a rivalry starts to develop between Rias, Akeno and Koneko and Illya, Chloe and Miyu over their shared love for Issei. Issei's little sisters and the female members of Rias' peerage, along with Rias herself eventually get along and start sharing Issei, although this is a long and eventual process that takes years. 

. Issei also discovers that Karen is the heiress of the Tohsaka clan of magi while Tsukihi is the heiress of the Matou clan of magi, with Karen being Illya's mentor in the magical arts when the latter awakened her powers. Issei also meets Miyu's mentor, the arrogant and bold Luvia Edelfelt. 

. During a meeting of the Gremory and Shitori peerages at the ORC clubhouse located in the old Tenbi school building, Student Council President Tsubawa Hanekawa surprises everybody by confessing her love for Issei under her true name of Souna Shitori, the heiress of the House of Shitori that rules the Underworld along with Rias' House the Gremory and the House of Phenix, in front of a shocked Rias and the Gremory Princess' stunned peerage. To everybody's shock, the female members of Hanekawa's peerage also confess their love for Issei as well after that, further increasing Issei's already large harem. 

Part 5: Idols and Challenges

. One day when going home, Issei meets a mysterious woman named Suruga Kanbaru, who is later revealed to be a famous women's college basketball player and also a well-known idol under the name of Hoshigaoka Stella. Kanbaru seems to be very familar with Issei despite them not meeting before, and teases him during their conversation about "tying the knot early with so many".

. It is later discovered that Suruga/Stella is actually Serafell Leviathan, one of the leaders of the Underworld and Hanekawa/Souna's estranged older sister. Hanekawa and Issei are revealed to be childhood friends, with a younger Hanekawa even swearing to marry Issei along with Irina when all three of them were children. This causes a considerable amount of embarrassment for both Hanekawa and Irina when this is exposed to the other girls by Serafell/Kanbaru/Stella. 

. Momoyo also reunites with Issei, and starts training him how to use his ki [physical energy] and chakra. She also falls in love with him and joins his harem. Issei and Miyako/Rei also reunite, and the blue-haired girl confesses her love for him, joining his harem as well. 

. The youngest daughter of Issei's adoptive parents Gorou and Miki, the half-kitsune [spirit fox]. half-snake god hybrid known as Sengoku Nadeko, awakens her powers as the reincarnation of the Dragon God Ophis, causing the pureblood devil Riseviem to send his minions after her. Rias, Hanekawa/Souna and Rias/Lizel along with their respective peerages are assigned to guard the precocious young girl, which causes Nadeko to develop a crush on her adoptive older brother Issei when she learns that he is Rias' Pawn and a hero in the supernatural world. 

. The fight against Riseveim is long and hard, but eventually, Issei manages to meld the power of his ookami yokai [wolf monster], devil and dragon forms into a single massive form, allowing him to destroy the madman once and for all. 

. Issei's rival, the White Dragon Emperor Vali Lucifer, is revealed to be a cute girl named Emila Hermit, and joins Issei's harem along with Nadeko and Koneko's sister, the supposed criminal Kuroka after Riseviem's fall. This causes the collapse of Khaos Brigade as many of its members refuse to accept this supposed betrayal.

Conclusion

The story ends with Issei thinking about his life, while the girls of his harem take care of their newborn babies throught the large mansion they now call home. 


.

Part I: Origins

Chapter 1: A New Life

In the ancient village of Uzushiogakure in the Land of Whirlpools, a child was born to the Ōtsutsuki clan, destined to be its heiress. Kushina Ōtsutsuki's birth was joyous, as her parents finally conceived a child, completely unaware of the soul of the legendary Juubi no Ookami within their daughter.

Chapter 2: Awakened Power

Kushina Ōtsutsuki grew up, quickly mastering the art of Fūinjutsu, Jūken taijutsu, and the magical arts passed down through her clan. Her Rinne-Sharingan and Byakugan set her apart, marking her for greatness within the Ōtsutsuki clan.

Chapter 3: New Life in the Hidden Leaf

After the destruction of her village, Kushina arrived in the Hidden Leaf Village as the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox. Able to block out Kurama's influence, she mastered her chakra, kept the truth about her Rinne-sharingan a secret, and sparked a secret relationship with Minato Namikaze and Mikoto Uchiha.

Chapter 4: A Secret Revealed

Itachi, the secret love child of Minato and Mikoto, awakened her Sharingan in extreme trauma, and found herself in Kamakura, raised by Tesshin Kawakami as Momoyo Kawakami. 

Part 2: Birth

Chapter 5: A Child is Born

Naruto was born a powerful ookami hanyou, destined to hold great power, thanks to his mother's divine heritage. However, the Reaper Death Seal sealed Kushina's soul and the Nine Tails' soul within Naruto, transforming him once more.

Chapter 6: A New Home

Six-year-old Naruto, trapped within an orphanage, suddenly found himself warped to Kyoto in Japan. Gorou and Miki Hyoudou discovered him, adopting him as their son, Issei Hyoudou. He quickly became an integral part of their large, loving family.

Part 3: Discovery

Chapter 7: Childhood

Issei grew up surrounded by love and support, forming strong bonds with his adoptive siblings and friends. He adapted to his new life, unaware of his incredible destiny or otherworldly origins. He boldly faced the trials in his path, knowing he had a family to support him.

Chapter 8: Teenage Years

Now a second-year high school student, Issei found himself in the middle of a supernatural war, discovering not only that he was part of a dangerous harem, but that he was a powerful hybrid of aookami hanyou, devil, andDragon reincarnated devil—far more powerful than any could anticipate.

Part 4: Idols and Challenges

Chapter 9: Celebrity Encounters

As Issei drowns in the attention of powerful women and faces his ever-complicating life, he meets Suruga Kanbaru, a famous basketball player and idol, who made a sudden, shocking confession. This revelation leads to Issei learning more about his true past and the dangers that lay ahead.

Chapter 10: Final Showdown

The battle against Riseviem pushed Issei to his limits, forcing him to unlock the full power of his combined heritage to defeat the madman.Forces from all sides rose against him, the harem grew larger and more insane, and ultimately, in the end, Issei triumphed.

Conclusion

In the aftermath of the chaos and struggles, Issei settled down with a harem of loving women who bore him many children. Reflecting on his journey, Issei settled into his new life, grateful for the family he found along the way and the legacy he helped create.

Part I: Origin and Youth

As the dust settled over the battlegrounds of the Elemental Nations, the atmosphere was thick with energy that pulsed silently, whispers of ancient power that hung in the air. Amid the chaos, a forgotten creature of power, the Ten-Tailed Wolf, escaped from its hidden prison, thanks to the efforts of dark forces who sought to manipulate it for their own purposes. The soul of the Ten-Tailed Wolf made its way to the land of the living under the cover of darkness, seeking a suitable vessel to call home.

Then, in the tiny world of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools, a baby girl named Kushina Ōtsutsuki was born. The formidable Ten-Tailed Wolf found what it was looking for. The newborn Kushina, her soul freshly passed to the afterlife, provided just the right vessel. The union of the Ten-Tailed Wolf's soul with young Kushina gave her unparalleled power and access to ancient arts. With her newfound abilities, she began her journey in the world she now ruled with an iron fist.

Growing up, Kushina proved to be a prodigy with exceptional abilities. She mastered the long-lost magical arts of the Ōtsutsuki clan under the watchful eye of her mysterious caretakers. As she honed her power, Kushina realized its origin – the Ten-Tailed Wolf. She was determined to maintain the dark secret, protecting her village and shrouding her true identity.

Years passed, and Kushina left her village to continue her training in the Hidden Leaf Village. As luck would have it, Kushina became the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox, which led to many changes in her life and forced her to face new challenges. Some would even argue this was the turning point in her life, where she had to confront the truth and come to terms with her destiny.

At the Hidden Leaf Village, Kushina met Mikoto Uchiha, and an unlikely bond was forged between the two. They ended up sharing the future Hokage, Minato Namikaze, as their husband in a secret polygamous relationship. Despite the unusual arrangement, they managed to raise a family and build a rich, loving life together.

Time went on, and Kushina and Minato's child, Naruto, was born as a half-wolf demon with supernatural powers. However, destiny throws a curveball at the young family when a dangerous force threatens the village. Minato was forced to use the Reaper Death Seal to protect the village and his family, inadvertently sealing Kushina's soul, along with the Juubi, inside their son, Naruto.

Part II: A New Life

Fast forward to when Naruto is five years old, an accident in the orphanage Naruto lives in sends him through a portal to a distant part of Japan, where he is found and adopted by Gorou and Miki Hyoudou. The Hyoudou family provides a loving home to the lost and injured Naruto, who grows alongside their biological children Karen and Tsukihi.

Naruto, now known as Issei, quickly became fast friends with the Hyoudou family's other children, as well as Gorou's consort Irisivel von Einzbern and her twin daughters Illya and Chloe. He also developed a close bond with Irisivel's maids Sella and Leysritt, who help to raise the children.

As he grows up, Issei finds himself enrolling at Tenbi High, where he excels academically and becomes a star baseball player. He catches the attention of the beautiful and mysterious Himekami Lizel, a seductive English teacher. Unbeknownst to Issei, Lizel is the Princess of the House of Gremory and a member of the magical underworld. She is captivated by Issei, his warm heart and strength, catching her eye when she learns of his destiny.

As Issei develops a stronger bond with Lizel and his friends, he discovers that his twin sisters Illya and Chloe hold extraordinary magical powers. The girls are fighting supernatural monsters that have started appearing around the city. They use the ancient art of magic called "Class Cards" to transform and defeat the creatures.

Issei is also reminded of his true heritage when he is reunited with his childhood friend, the powerful martial artist Momoyo Kawakami. Together, they uncover secrets of Issei's past, delving into the mysteries of the Juubi and its connection to the Ookami Yokai. Sen Goku Nadeko, another character from the magical world, weaves a thread of intrigue, tying the characters in fate to face a threat that could end their lives as they know it.

Part IV: Trials and Triumphs

As Issei and his friends navigate the magical underworld, they face many adversaries and obstacles, including tests of loyalty and trust, power struggles, and unlikely pairings. With his newfound abilities and control over yokai, Issei is thrust into the forefront of the battle, pitting him against evil forces.

Still, through adversity and chaos, the bond between Issei and his friends deepens. The family must rely on each other for support, love, and most importantly, safety. They find strength together, knowing full well that they are going up against an enemy that could spell their doom.

Throughout the thrilling and breathtaking story, we see Issei grow into a powerful, confident young man with a loving family by his side. He faces unbelievable challenges and learns to wield his power, leading to a harrowing showdown against the ultimate enemy – the reincarnation of the Dragon God Ophis, the one prophesized to destroy the world.

The story concludes with Issei standing victorious, proud and surrounded by his friends and family. He has, against all odds, saved the world and achieved his destiny, leading a new generation of heroes and showing that love and kindness can conquer even the most terrifying of obstacles. The young family that had grown so close together now begins a new chapter in their lives, as Issei and his harem raise their children in the world they had saved through love, strength, determination, and perseverance.

conversation.content:
Write an interesting, riveting, lengthy action-packed series of chapters for a  fanfic that is a crossover between Naruto, Fate Stay Night: Prisma Illya, Majikoi, Bakemonogatari and High School DxD. 

The plot should go something like this, with the below events happening in chronological order:

Part I: Origins

. The soul of the Juubi no Ookami [Ten Tailed Wolf] escapes the seal Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, known to most people in the Elemental Nations as the Rikodo Senin [Sage of Six Paths] had placed to trap it inside the new moon he had created for eternity, and enters the body of a newborn Kushina Ōtsutsuki, the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan of Uzushiogakure no Sato in the Land of Whirlpools after the newborn child's soul ends up passing to the afterlife. 

Kushina's parents are unaware of this, because of their joy at finally being able to conceive a child. 

. Due to her status as the Ōtsutsuki clan heiress and also due to her soul being that of the Juubi no Ookami, an already famous and powerful yokai that became even more powerful due to it consuming a spare Shinju fruit sometime after Kaguya Ōtsutsuki did, Kushina has the Rinne-Sharingan, along with the infamous doujutsu kekkai genkai [eye jutsu bloodline] of the Ōtsutsuki clan, the Byakugan. 

As she grows, she quickly becomes a master of Fūinjutsu [sealing arts] and the long lost magical arts of the Ōtsutsuki clan, passed down from its founder Hamura Ōtsutsuki, the older brother of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, the legendary Sage of Six Paths. 

.Kushina keeps the fact that she has the Rinne-Sharingan a secret, as even she herself is not sure how to use this power

. She also masters the Jūken style of taijutsu [martial arts] that utilizes the ability of the Byakugan to see and observe chakra in an opponent, to quickly strike the chakra circulation points and shut them down.

. Kushina still ends up in the Hidden Leaf and becomes the jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox after the destruction of Uzushiogakure no Sato by the Hidden Rain, Cloud and Earth Villages during the Second Great Ninja War. 

However, due to her true self as the legendary Ten-Tails that the Sage of Six Paths had sealed away and her training as the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan, she is able to block out Kurama's influence and regain mastery of her chakra, masking the usage of her own yokai as the Ten-Tails as simply her using the Nine Tails' power. 

. She is also to finally able to understand and use some of the powers of her Rinne-Sharingan, due to secretly reading the Senju and Uchiha secret scrolls. 

. Kushina and Mikoto Uchiha share Minato in a secret polygamous relationship, despite Mikoto's engagement to the head of the Uchiha clan, Fugaku. 

. Itachi is the secret love child of Minato Namkaze and Mikoto Uchiha, and is actually a girl named Isane. Sometime after the Kyuubi attack, she awakens her Sharingan due to the stress and trauma of the event and ends up warping herself via Kamui to Kamakura, where she is found by Tesshin Kawakami, an elderly monk and legendary martial artist, and raised as his granddaughter, Momoyo Kawakami. 


Part 2: Birth

. This version of Naruto is born as a ookami hanyou [half wolf monster] akin to Inuyasha, the protagonist of the Inuyasha anime and manga series. However, he is more akin to Sesshomaru in the fact that he has elfen ears, silver hair and yellow eyes and does not have wolf ears on top of his head, unless he taps into his yokai during emotional distress. 

This is due to Kushina being a primordial goddess as well as a daiyokai [monster lord], giving her child the strengths and powers of a full-blooded yokai while simultaneously allowing him to keep his humanity.

. Due to a poorly worded request, Kushina's soul [the Ten-Tails/Juubi] gets sealed along with the soul of Kurama Ōtsutsuki inside baby Naruto when Minato uses the Shiki Fujin [Reaper Death Seal] to seal away the Nine Tails inside his son. After the sealing, Naruto's hair turns black and his eyes blue, and he gains whisker marks on his cheeks due to the seal also sealing away his yoki and yokai power, along with Kushina and Kurama. 

Part 3: Discovery

. Things remain unchanged until Naruto is about 5 or 6 years old, and is locked in his room inside the orphanage. He makes a wish about not having to be in Konoha again, and due to unconsciously pulling on Kushina's power inside the seal, finds himself being warped via a superpowered Kamui to Kyoto in Japan, where he is quickly found by salaryman Gorou Hyoudou and his wife, Miki.

. Gorou and Miki adopt Naruto as their son, Issei Hyoudou and Issei grows up in a loving home, never knowing the truth of his origins or what is sealed inside of him. He becomes fast friends with Gorou and Miki's biological children, the fraternal twins Karen and Tsukihi, who are three years younger than Issei and view him as their real older brother as time goes by. 

. Issei also grows close to Gorou's consort Irisivel von Einzbern, a German noblewoman with white hair, a large bust and red eyes, and Irisivel's children, the twins Illya and Chloe. He also develops a close relationship with Irisivel's maids Sella and Leysritt, whom all the children view as their eccentric older sisters.

. He also grows close to his adoptive older cousin Irina Shidou, although he is saddened when she has to leave with her family to England. 

. On a family trip to Kamakura, Issei meets Momoyo, and the two become fast friends despite their vast age difference. Momoyo senses Issei's familar chakra and is surprised that he has her mother's friend Kushina as well as the Nine Tails inside of him, but she keeps this suspicion to herself.

. Issei also meets the shy and reclusive, blue haired and red-eyed girl Miyako Shiina, who is actually the daughter of Gendo Ikari and his wife Yui Ayanami created as a weapon to pilot the experimental EVA Unit mechs, Rei Ayanami, and the two become fast friends. 

Unfortunately, Miyako/Rei is discovered by some of Gendo's thugs and taken back to the Geofront, although she never forgets the memories of her time with Issei. 

.Karen's abilities as an ookami yokai [wolf monster] and the heiress to the Tohkasa clan prematurely awaken during the trip and as a result, she enters a form akin to a hanyou, with her wolf ears popping out of the top of her head at inappropriate times. This earns her the name "Wanko" from Momoyo, which she finds rather distasteful. 

. Tsukihi is kidnapped near the end of the trip, and the family spends 2 sleepless days worrying about her until Sella returns, holding a sleeping Tsukihi in her arms in a princess carry style with her regular bland look on her face. The local news reports that the Matou family, a local Mafia clan infamous for their strange activities, was wiped out by an unknown assailant. Issei quickly puts two and two together, but says nothing. 

. The experience changes Tsukihi, making her even more reclused and introverted than before. Her hair turns a bright purple, and she cuts it in a short bowl cut after recovering enough to leave the hospital. She also starts wearing traditional Japanese clothes at home, constantly harassing Sella and Leysritt to teach her the arts of homemaking, which they relent and give into in the end. Surprisingly, Tsukihi is very good at this task and is praised by the two maids for her skill and diligence. 

Part 4: Adolescence

. Issei grows into a confident, charming young man, unaware of his true origins and not caring about them anyways. From elementary to middle school, he is a star student and a rather famous baseball player, which earns him the jealousy of his classmates. 

. His younger adoptive sisters Karen, Tsukihi, Illya and Chloe all have feelings for him, even though he is unaware of this and just assumes they love him a bit too dearly. 

. When Issei is a second year at Tenbi High, he catches the eye of seductive, popular English teacher Himekami Lizel. Lizel is actually the Princess of the House of Gremory, the de-facto royal family of the Underworld, Rias Gremory. Lizel under her true name of Rias, is interested in Issei due to his powerful Sacred Gear of the Red Dragon Emperor, but she finds herself falling in love with him due to his kindness and good heart. 

. One day, Issei is mistaken for his perverted friends Matsuda and Motohoma, and beaten to an inch of his life by the enraged Kendo Club in a case of mistaken identity. Lizel, seizing the opportunity, revives the young man as her Pawn, which has the unexpected result of loosening the seal and allowing his yoki, which had been building up inside of him, to finally be released and circulate through his body. 

. This, along with the fact that the reincarnation process awoke Ddraig, the legendary Welsh Dragon inside Issei's Sacred Gear, essentially reconstructs Issei into a draconic- ookami hanyou [half wolf monster]-demigod reincarnated devil hybrid, enhancing and boosting his already formidable power 100 fold. 

. Issei is surprised at his new powers when he awakens and is confused when Lizel informs him of her true identity and what he now is, but quickly adjusts to it. 

. The plot of High School DxD continues as in the canon light novels, manga and 2012-2018 anime series, with the exception of Issei defeating Riser and the Phenix heir's peerage during the Rating Game, convincing the three female Fallen Angels Raynare, Kalwarner and Millet to join his side and killing the insane priest Freed Seltzen during the attack on the church before the fight against Riser and his peerage, and Irina revealing she is a succubus during the Holy Sword search arc. 

. Issei also discovers that his younger adoptive half-sisters, the fraternal twins Illya and Chloe von Einzbern, are actually magical girls who use the Class Cards to transform and fight the supernatural monsters popping up in the city. 

He also discovers Illya and Chloe's best friend, the reserved but intelligent black-haired Japanese beauty Miyu Edelfelt, is also a magical girl. 

This discovery comes as a result of Rias and her peerage receiving a message from the Archduke to kill a group of Strays causing trouble, only to find Illya, Chloe and Miyu leaving the scene with the monsters dead. 

. Needless to say, Rias/Lizel is not pleased and a rivalry starts to develop between Rias, Akeno and Koneko and Illya, Chloe and Miyu over their shared love for Issei. Issei's little sisters and the female members of Rias' peerage, along with Rias herself eventually get along and start sharing Issei, although this is a long and eventual process that takes years. 

. Issei also discovers that Karen is the heiress of the Tohsaka clan of magi while Tsukihi is the heiress of the Matou clan of magi, with Karen being Illya's mentor in the magical arts when the latter awakened her powers. Issei also meets Miyu's mentor, the arrogant and bold Luvia Edelfelt. 

. During a meeting of the Gremory and Shitori peerages at the ORC clubhouse located in the old Tenbi school building, Student Council President Tsubawa Hanekawa surprises everybody by confessing her love for Issei under her true name of Souna Shitori, the heiress of the House of Shitori that rules the Underworld along with Rias' House the Gremory and the House of Phenix, in front of a shocked Rias and the Gremory Princess' stunned peerage. To everybody's shock, the female members of Hanekawa's peerage also confess their love for Issei as well after that, further increasing Issei's already large harem. 

Part 5: Idols and Challenges

. One day when going home, Issei meets a mysterious woman named Suruga Kanbaru, who is later revealed to be a famous women's college basketball player and also a well-known idol under the name of Hoshigaoka Stella. Kanbaru seems to be very familiar with Issei despite them not meeting before, and teases him during their conversation about "tying the knot early with so many".

. It is later discovered that Suruga/Stella is actually Serafell Leviathan, one of the leaders of the Underworld and Hanekawa/Souna's estranged older sister. Hanekawa and Issei are revealed to be childhood friends, with a younger Hanekawa even swearing to marry Issei along with Irina when all three of them were children. This causes a considerable amount of embarrassment for both Hanekawa and Irina when this is exposed to the other girls by Serafell/Kanbaru/Stella. 

. Momoyo also reunites with Issei, and starts training him how to use his ki [physical energy] and chakra. She also falls in love with him and joins his harem. 

Issei and Miyako/Rei also reunite, and the blue-haired girl confesses her love for him, joining his harem as well. 

. The youngest daughter of Issei's adoptive parents Gorou and Miki, the half-kitsune [spirit fox]. half-snake god hybrid known as Sengoku Nadeko, awakens her powers as the reincarnation of the Dragon God Ophis, causing the pureblood devil Riseviem to send his minions after her. 

Rias, Hanekawa/Souna and Rias/Lizel along with their respective peerages are assigned to guard the precocious young girl, which causes Nadeko to develop a crush on her adoptive older brother Issei when she learns that he is Rias' Pawn and a hero in the supernatural world. 

. The fight against Riseveim is long and hard, but eventually, Issei manages to meld the power of his ookami yokai [wolf monster], devil and dragon forms into a single massive form, allowing him to destroy the madman once and for all. 

. Issei's rival, the White Dragon Emperor Vali Lucifer, is revealed to be a cute girl named Emila Hermit, and joins Issei's harem along with Nadeko and Koneko's sister, the supposed criminal Kuroka after Riseviem's fall. 

This causes the collapse of Khaos Brigade as many of its members refuse to accept this supposed betrayal.

Conclusion

The story ends with Issei thinking about his life, while the girls of his harem take care of their newborn babies through the large mansion they now call home. 


.

Chapter 1: A Fateful Encounter

The world of Naruto was not a peaceful one. With its shinobi nations constantly at war with one another, the Elders of Konoha were always on the lookout for new strategies, new powers, and new heroes who would turn the tide of battle in their favor.

One day, a young girl named Kushina Ōtsutsuki was discovered to be the perfect candidate to help their cause. Unbeknownst to everyone in the village, she was the heiress of the Ōtsutsuki clan and had been secretly training in the arts of Fūinjutsu and the Jūken taijutsu style for years.

Chapter 2: Hidden Secrets

As Kushina trained in the Hidden Leaf, her powers and skills continued to grow rapidly. She eventually discovered her true nature and realized that she held the power of the Rinne-Sharingan, the legendary doujutsu kekkai genkai of the Ōtsutsuki clan. However, she chose to keep this a secret, even from her closest friends.

In time, she would fall in love with Minato Namikaze, the Fourth Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village. Their love blossomed, and in due time, they would have a child together. Fate, however, had other plans for this child...

Chapter 3: The Prophecy

At the time of their child's birth, a prophecy had already been made, foretelling the arrival of a powerful being who would wield the combined strength of a yokai, devil, and dragon. This child was destined to change the world and bring about a new era of peace and prosperity.

At the moment their child, Naruto, was born, a series of events were set in motion that would shape the boy's destiny. For during his birth, the soul of the Juubi no Ookami entered his body, resulting in a cascade of unforeseen consequences.

Chapter 4: A New Path

Years passed, and life in the Hidden Leaf Village went on relatively undisturbed. Naruto, now a clever and compassionate young boy, was unaware of the immense power that lay dormant within him. However, fate had other plans for him, and during a moment of crisis, he is transported across time and space to a new world where he would be raised by the Hyoudou family.

As he grew up among this loving and close-knit family, Naruto- now Issei- became close to his adoptive siblings Karen, Tsukihi, Illya, and Chloe. He also formed friendships with other extraordinary individuals, such as Momoyo Kawakami and Miyako Shiina.

Chapter 5: The Awakening

Despite living a peaceful life far from village politics and strife, Issei would soon find himself dragged into the world of the supernatural when the time came for him to awaken the powers hidden inside him.

When the time came for him to protect his family and friends, an event in Issei's life would trigger the transformation that would reveal his true nature as a draconic-ookami hanyou demigod reincarnated devil hybrid. As he learned to harness and control these newfound powers, he drew the attention of individuals far and wide, changing his life forever.

Chapter 6: The Struggle

With his newfound power, Issei found himself embroiled in conflicts both within his personal life and the larger supernatural world. Jealous rivals, powerful adversaries, and even challenges from his past would all rear their heads as Issei's journey continued.

As if facing these challenges wasn't enough, Issei would also find himself at the heart of a complex web of relationships, as his kindness and strength endeared him to a growing number of powerful and influential people, leading to a vast and diverse harem.

Chapter 7: The Final Battle

The culminating event in Issei's life would pit him against the evil Riseviem, a powerful and ambitious figure who sought to use power for his own nefarious purposes. Issei would need to draw upon all the strength and skill he had developed over the years, as well as rely on his friends and allies, to defeat this seemingly insurmountable foe.

In the end, Issei would prevail, bringing Riseviem and his cohorts to justice and securing a brighter future for himself, his loved ones, and the greater world at large.

Epilogue

With the dust settled and the battle won, Issei finally had the time to reflect upon his incredible journey. He had grown in unimaginable ways and forged unbreakable bonds with people from a myriad of backgrounds, all united under the banner of love.

Returning to the mansion he shared with his large family, Issei marveled at how his life had changed, grateful for the contributions he'd made to the world and the many lives he had touched. And, as he looked at the newest members of his ever-growing family taking their first steps into the world, he knew that his legacy would carry on for generations.

The End.
